analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x418e831d865dcb26af9721b277d2dce58526c6b9.sol:
	Contract DigimaWebToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x418e831d865dcb26af9721b277d2dce58526c6b9.sol#220)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x418e831d865dcb26af9721b277d2dce58526c6b9.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
